item.title: Basic Tutorial
item.description: This basic tutorial takes you through the minimal but most general workflow of the captus_assembly pipeline. 0. Preparation Installation To run this tutorial, you need to install the following programs on your system: Captus and its dependencies (see Installation) IQ-TREE version 2.0 or higher (see IQ-TREE documentation) If conda command is available, you can take the easiest way. Simply run the two commands below to set up and activate an environment:
